mdRecord.dcterms:title: Robert Spring forgery of George Washington to Jabez Huntington, 1781 April 10
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Spring, Robert
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Forgery by Robert Spring. Forged document falsely states George Washington's request for Sylvanus Cutler's discharge at the request of the Selectmen of Norwich, Connecticut to be discharged from jail where he is held under military order. Autograph document signed, laminated. Name on original manuscript appears as "G. Washington".
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Forgery
